statement: PM Modi addressed Pongal celebrations in New Delhi on January 14, 2026.
Ambassadors from three countries presented their credentials to the President of India.
The 26th National Youth Parliament Competition 2024-2025 award ceremony was held for Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas.
Wholesale Price Index numbers for December 2025 were released (Base Year: 2011-12).
PM Modi will inaugurate the 28th Conference of Commonwealth Speakers and Presiding Officers on January 15.
Union Home Minister Amit Shah addressed the 15th convocation ceremony at CHARUSAT in Anand, Gujarat.
Nine Amrit Bharat Express trains connecting Assam and West Bengal will be flagged off soon.
SECI achieved Excellent rating in MoU Performance for FY 2024-25.
Central Bureau of Narcotics busted an MD manufacturing lab in Madhya Pradesh with record seizure.
The 10th Armed Forces Veterans Day will be celebrated to honor the valor and sacrifice of ex-servicemen.
PM-KISAN scheme has transferred Rs 3.24 lakh crore to over 11.8 crore eligible farmers.
Ayushman Bharat scheme provides health coverage of Rs 5 lakh per family per year.
The Digital India programme has created over 58 lakh jobs since its launch.
UPI transactions crossed 15 billion in November 2025.
Swachh Bharat Mission has constructed over 12 crore toilets in rural India.
India launched Chandrayaan-3 successfully in July 2023 and landed on the Moon south pole.
Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana has provided free LPG connections to over 10 crore households.
National Education Policy 2020 introduced 5+3+3+4 structure for school education.
Jal Jeevan Mission aims to provide tap water to all rural households by 2026.
GST collection crossed Rs 2.1 lakh crore in April 2025.
Make in India initiative has attracted over USD 130 billion in FDI since 2014.
Startup India has recognized over 1.25 lakh startups as of December 2025.
Vande Bharat Express trains are operating on 56 routes across India.
Aadhaar has been issued to over 140 crore residents of India.
India became the 5th largest economy in the world surpassing UK in 2022.
PMGSY has constructed over 8 lakh km of rural roads connecting remote villages.
Unified Pension Scheme announced for Central Government employees in August 2024.
PM Vishwakarma scheme launched to support traditional artisans and craftspeople.
India achieved 200 GW renewable energy capacity milestone in 2025.
source: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy/PIB

statement: FAME-II scheme has supported deployment of over 1.5 million electric vehicles.
National Green Hydrogen Mission aims to produce 5 million tonnes of green hydrogen annually by 2030.
PM SVANidhi has disbursed loans to over 78 lakh street vendors.
RBI maintained repo rate at 6.5% in December 2025 monetary policy review.
National Logistics Policy aims to reduce logistics cost from 14% to 8% of GDP.
PM MUDRA Yojana has sanctioned loans worth over Rs 28 lakh crore since launch.
Direct Benefit Transfer has saved Rs 3.48 lakh crore by eliminating middlemen.
Government has not announced free electricity to all farmers as of January 2026.
Production Linked Incentive scheme covers 14 key sectors with Rs 1.97 lakh crore outlay.
Krishi Infrastructure Fund worth Rs 1 lakh crore announced for agriculture infrastructure.
One Nation One Ration Card scheme enables beneficiaries to access PDS from anywhere in India.
National Highway construction has reached record 13,500 km per year.
PM Gati Shakti Master Plan integrates 16 ministries for infrastructure planning.
CoWIN platform administered over 220 crore COVID vaccine doses in India.
India Semiconductor Mission has approved Rs 76,000 crore for chip manufacturing.
Sagarmala project aims to modernize ports and develop coastal employment.
National Mission for Clean Ganga has completed 438 projects worth Rs 37,000 crore.
RERA has registered over 1.2 lakh real estate projects ensuring buyer protection.
Jan Dhan accounts have crossed 53 crore with total deposits over Rs 2.3 lakh crore.
Skill India Mission has trained over 1.6 crore youth since 2015.
UDAN scheme has operationalized 581 air routes connecting unserved airports.
